Since early 2015, there has been a noticeable shift in attitudes towards online platforms among commentators and regulators. Initially, critical perspectives were relatively uncommon, with notable exceptions such as Evgeny Morozov, who in 2015 characterized many platforms as "parasitic," suggesting they thrive on existing social and economic relationships.
